This is release version 0.6 of 
	-------------------------------------------------------------
	'TemplateMaschine' - an open source template engine for C#	
	-------------------------------------------------------------
written by Stefan Sarstedt (http://www.stefansarstedt.com/)
Released under GNU Lesser General Public License (LGPL)

History:
--------
  - initial release (version 0.5) on Oct 28th, 2004
  - minor bugfixes (version 0.6) on March 29th, 2005

Contents:
---------
  - TemplateMaschine.cs (the template processor source)
  - SampleDriver.cs     (a sample driver for templates)
  - Sample.template     (a simple template)
  - run.bat             (compiles all sources and executes sample template)
additional templates (modify 'run.bat' accordingly):
  - SampleDriver2.cs, Sample2.template and Config.xml (a template using arguments)
  - SampleDriver3.cs (a driver using an embedded template)
